events: Folkero was born in Helle voet in 1379.
Lost sibling Hilduardis when Hilduardis was 6 in 1380.
Lost sibling Godeuert when Godeuert was 1 in 1381.
Lost mother at the age of 9 in childbirth.
Lost sibling Suam when Suam was 1 in 1388.
Had Euffemia move into family home at Helle voet.C.11 after marriage.
Lost sibling Sollen when Sollen was 14 in 1397.
Lost sibling Sanders when Sanders was 11 in 1397.
Got married with Euffemia at age 18 in 1396.
Became a widower at 18 in childbirth.
